subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: John Lackey beat Justin Verlander in a pitchers’ duel, Boston’s Mike Napoli homered for the only run of the game, and the Red Sox beat the Tigers to take a 2-1 series lead in the A.L.C.S.
snippet: John Lackey beat Justin Verlander in a pitchers’ duel, Boston’s Mike Napoli homered for the only run of the game, and the Red Sox beat the Tigers to take a 2-1 series lead in the A.L.C.S.
